annotations: Experience safe Transportation Driver with excellent driving and customer service records. High

scheduling flexibility including transporting passengers. Knowledge of all FMCSA safety standards and training for large vehicle. Knowledge of how-to logon and off Analog screen able to read route guide receive money via farebox and issue transfers to passengers. Ability to direct passenger to their next route connection. Plan, direct coordinate my own transportation service operation/receptionist, and other office support services. Oversee facilities planning and maintenance and custodial operations.
08/07/2018 – Current Uber/Lyft Ride and Share Charlotte, NC
10/2008-05/2017 – Transit MGMT of Charlotte, INC Charlotte, NC/ Transit Bus Driver

Duties – Operate Bus on variety of schedule routes and stops. Able to maneuver and detour when required. Identify operational and mechanical issues report to garage technical maintenance crew. Conduct pre-trip inspections daily prior to starting route. Handle wheelchair restraints, resistant or hostile passengers’ infraction of bus conduct and FMCSA safety rules.
